title: My Special One
overview: Sahoko, an unremarkable high school girl, despises good-looking boys and has sworn off love after experiencing deep emotional pain. But her life takes an unexpected turn when she meets Kouta, a gorgeous pop star. As she gets to know his passion for his fans and his kindness, she realizes that he is different from the boys who have hurt her. Despite her strong resolve, she finds herself falling for him. However, Sahoko learns that Kouta, too, has made a firm decision in his heart to avoid special bond due to his own painful past.
